price: 199. et que (leur Messager) le leur eût récité, ils n’y auraient pas cru (pour autant).
arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faqara-ahu ʿalayhim mā kānū bihi mu'minīna
